name: Pokemon-conjure
tagline: This Git Repository is for the Pokemon Firered hack, Pokemon Conjure by Hajima and Nonibros.
body:
## Welcome to the Project!
Thanks for visiting the Pokemon Conjure page.

### Change Log
We have a change log of the entire project, which can be found [here](CHANGELOG.html).

### Other Website
There is another website at [pokemonconjure.tk](http://pokemonconjure.tk), which is the main site.

### Authors and Contributors
Hajima (@hajimapc) and Nonibros (@nonibros) are currently the main contributors to the project. More names will be added as we have more people.

### Contact
Having an issue with the project website? Found bugs in the patches? Want to suggest new features? PM us on the [main site](http://www.pokecommunity.com/) or [the thread](http://www.pokecommunity.com/showthread.php?p=9255238) and weâ€™ll work on the issue as soon as we can.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
